description: Post Office and general village stores. Specialises in local produce.
name: Banham Post Office and Stores

address: The Appleyard, Kenninghall Road, Banham, Norfolk NR16 2HE
description: Family run butchers shop; open seven days a week selling prime local meat, shop produced butchery products, home cooked pies and snacks. Shop open (1 customer inside at once), or order by phone or online.
name: Banham Butchers

description: Bistro menu available for delivery, please call to discuss. Fresh bakes and cakes available for order and collection from Banham Butchers.
name: Kenninghall Bistro

description: Small scale CAMRA award winning cider making business in Banham since 1989. We will deliver free of charge within a 20 mile radius of us.
name: Burnard's Cider

address: The Studio, Paperhouse, West Harling, Norfolk NR16 2SF
description: Promoting Norfolk and Suffolk artisan food. Delivery within a 15 mile radius of East Harling
name: The Little White Lamb

description: Convenience Store and Post Office. Delivery for those self-isolating via volunteers of Kenninghall, John Richardson and the Kenninghall News - tel: 07747 325808

address: The Appleyard, Kenninghall Road, Banham, Norfolk NR16 2HE
description: Local fish & chip shop / restuarant. Usual range of fish, chips, burgers, pies, kebabs. Currently take out only - please call first to order.
name: The Trawlers Catch

address: Banham Zoo, Kenninghall Road, Banham, Norfolk NR16 2HE
description: Independent garden centre and gift shop with plants primarily from East Anglian growers. Open for local delivery; please phone 9.30am-5pm any day except Tuesday and Wednesday, to let us know your requirements.
name: The Garden Enclosure

address: Sycamore Farm, Pristow Green Lane, Tibenham, Norfolk NR16 1PU
description: Award winning smallholding in Norfolk rearing rare breed pigs and sheep. Along with fresh pork and pork products (pies etc), currently stocking a regularly changing variety of other artisan produce. See the Facebook page or Karen's posts on Nextdoor for current stock.
name: Samphire

address: Rectory Rd, Tivetshall St. Margaret, Norfolk NR15 2EJ
description:
Home delivery - milk man style service, but with wine!
Join in the #RefillRevolution - every Thursday we deliver between 5 - 8pm.
We take away the empties and replace with fresh refills of your favourite Tipple.
Order below before 12pm on the day of delivery and we'll get you added onto the round.
name: Tap & Tipple
